verbs.description: Texas nonprofit Southwest Key Programs [V: has] snagged a half billion grant from the Trump administration to care for children detained crossing the U.S. border , according to a report Tuesday . The $ 458 million grant to care for migrant children covers the rest of 2018 , Bloomberg News reported . The federal contractor is vying for a new shelter in downtown Houston as the government struggles to house thousands of children detained at the border , ...
